tasks.label: Build IC10 Extension
args: Set-Location -LiteralPath 'FlorpyDorp Language Support'; if (-not (Test-Path node_modules)) { npm install }; npm run esbuild; Set-Location -LiteralPath '..\ic10lsp'; if (-not (Test-Path target\debug\ic10lsp.exe)) { cargo build }; Copy-Item '.\target\debug\ic10lsp.exe' '..\FlorpyDorp Language Support\bin\ic10lsp.exe' -Force
